import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; class Users extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { userData: [], // To store the list of users message: null, // To store error messages }; } componentDidMount() { this.getUserData(); } getUserData = async () => { try { const response = await fetch("http://localhost/react/epicpro-backend/get_users.php"); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to fetch data'); } const data = await response.json(); if (data.length > 0) { this.setState({ userData: data }); } else { this.setState({ message: 'No users found' }); } } catch (error) { this.setState({ message: 'Error fetching user data' }); } }; render() { const { fixNavbar } = this.props; const { userData, message } = this.state; return ( <>
